page.title: 16Mr.Seddon Pest Controller
page.content: At 7.00am Mr.Seddon got up, dressed and had breakfast. He then went out to cut a supply of logs for the kitchen stove at 7.45am. At 8.15am, he prepared his equipment for the day's work which includes poisonous sprays,baits, a power sprayer, aerosal sprays, rat and mouse bait, bellows for smoking out the bees and cage traps. After preparing the equipment,at 8.30 a.m., Mr. Seddon travels to work. (the Council Officess on Buccleuch Street in Dumfries)At 8.55, he checked his list of outstanding complaints. He finishes checking the list at 9.00 a.m. and then leaves his office and journeys to his first complaint He arrives at 9.35 and visits a large country property near Tynron to remove a bee swarm from an upstairs room. It was to be released in a safer place!
